title: Game Room, Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Stations, Dog Park
map_address: 2045 S. Forum Drive near Sara Jane Pkwy
posting_body: ['Copeland', '2045 S. Forum Drive , Grand Prairie, TX, 75052', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 72', 'OR Text', '72', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'NEW APTS COMING 2021', 'This is a 2 Bedroom + 1 Den, 2 Bath, approximately 1307 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Just in case you needed proof that life is good, here comes Copeland.', "This new apartment community in Grand Prairie will live up to the city's reputation of happy residents with vibrant social spaces and a resort-worthy pool & spa.", '(Did we mention there will be complimentary kombucha on tap in the game room?)', 'When staying home is in order, our fabulously appointed apartments come with all the bells and whistles.', 'Come on over to Copeland', 'and get happy.', 'Features', '- Modern, Flat-Panel Cabinets with Under-Cabinet Lighting', '- Quartz Countertops & Subway Tile Backsplashes', '- Wood-Style Plank Flooring', '- Oversized Walk-In Closets & Additional Private Storage*', '- Washers & Dryers', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- Dog Park', '- Patio Lounge with Ping Pong & BBQ Grills', '- Yoga & Spin Room', '- 24-Hour Fitness Studio', '- Resort-worthy pool', '- Electric Vehicle (EV)', 'Charging Stations', '- Game Room', '- Complimentary kombucha on tap', '- Community Kitchen with Espresso Bar', '- Conference Room & Private Offices', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $350, Rent $25', 'Comments: At Copeland, we welcome your furry friends!', 'We charge a $350 non- refundable pet fee per pet and $25 monthly pet rent, per pet.', 'Restrictions: Breed restrictions apply.', 'All pets will require registration, photos, and records in <URL>, and an additional fee will apply.', 'HEjJ0x8bh']
